description: [QUIETEXIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1084) can attempt to connect to a second hard-coded C2 if the first hard-coded C2 address fails.(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)

external_references.description: Mandiant. (2022, May 2). UNC3524: Eye Spy on Your Email. Retrieved August 17, 2023.
external_references.source_name: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22
